name: Temple Topple (NDS)
description:
The Temple Is Toppling and Jumping High Is Your Best Chance for Escape!

Play on your PC using the provided NDS Emulator or play on your actual DS console using a DS flash cart.

Developed with DS Game Maker ver. 5.21 during the BowersIndustry's Nintendo Game Jam! 

Learn more about DS Game Maker from the DS Game Maker Resource Site.
